name: World Dasher (Demo)
description:
World Dasher is a First Person Platforming game made in Unreal Engine 4. This game was a goal of mine to complete a playable version within a weeks time. This is my first game I've ever released so I hope it isn't too bad.

Objective:
Gather collectibles and traverse through the map with many using wall running, dashing, wall climbing. | And the sliding mechanic is soon to come.

(I'm currently working on adding enemies to the maps)

Controls:
Dash - Left Shift KeyClimb - Hold Space on Vertical Wall
Wall Run - Hold E On Horizontal Wall

I'd love to hear feedback and what you guys would like to see in the game.
